TopicTitle: i wish we still had a balloons mod

Articles.Content: airships are lovely, and great for exploration and transport, but the previous mods were hooliganlabs (mostly very impractical shapes and lacking any useful airship engines of its own) and modular airships (Very realistic and confusing and difficult to use effectively), but now we got nothing, and I really miss it. its just really relaxing to me to fly a nice slow airship around duna or eve, and cool to use it with KAS and mining for ore (previously with kethane) to fly indefinitely.
We do have one; it's called KerBalloons.

Not sure why he said "balloons" in the thread title but clearly talking about airships, which Kerballoons does not cover at all, nor does it plan to based on its current roadmap. I agree some airship mods would be nice to have again, I never got a chance to really play around with Hooligan or modular airships
